Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Relates to records of elevator maintenance or vertical transportation, operation issues and repairs
Summary: Requires records of elevator or vertical transportation maintenance, operation issues and repairs be made available to the municipal department having jurisdiction over such elevator or vertical transportation.
LawCode: Amd ยง51, Mult Dwell L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the multiple dwelling law, in relation to requiring records of elevator maintenance, operation issues and repairs be made available
